name: Near the Sea
description:
In a small village that sits by the ravenous sea, the most important tales sometimes are the ones that dead men tell.

---

A game developed by a GameDevTecnico team for the SuNoFes 2022 Jam, by Diogo Pires & Julia Pinheiro

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/
